content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog this textured doily has 23 rounds and measures about 10 1/2 in diameter i used the first 9 rounds of the pattern for frost nova 1 which already had a few hearts and added more to the outer section for a total of 24 hearts pattern is written using u s terminology **materials needed** * size 10 thread in 2 colors- color 1- 125-150 yards color 2- 5-10 yards * 1 75 mm hook * yarn needle * scissors **special stitches** * beg 4-double_crochet cluster * 4-double_crochet cluster * 2-double_crochet decrease * 3-double_crochet decrease * 2-fpdc decrease * beg 3-double_crochet cluster * 3-double_crochet cluster * 4-fpdc decrease * special fpdc decrease * 3-fpdc decrease * 2-fpdc cluster * picot * large picot 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/frost-nova russian translation has been provided by ula tomaszewska
